info.description: PayNaiDee (เปย์ไหนดี) - Backend API service for expense sharing application with real-time chat, bill splitting, and QR code payment generation.
info.title: PayNaiDee API

post.description: Authenticate user and receive access and refresh tokens
Get new access and refresh tokens using a valid refresh token
Create a new user account and receive authentication tokens
Process a bill image using OCR to extract bill data (placeholder - not yet implemented)

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific bill with participants

403.description: Not a member of the bill's group

put.description: Update the payment status for a bill participant

get.description: Generate a PromptPay QR code for a specific participant's amount

parameters.description: Custom header text for QR code
parameters.name: header

get.description: Generate a PromptPay QR code for the full bill amount to the bill creator
get.summary: Generate QR code for full bill

parameters.description: Custom header text for QR code
parameters.name: header

get.description: Retrieve all groups the authenticated user belongs to

post.description: Create a new group with the authenticated user as admin

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific group (member only)

403.description: Not a member of this group

put.description: Update group name and avatar (admin only)

403.description: Not an admin of this group

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of bills for a group

403.description: Not a member of this group

post.description: Create a new bill with participants and split calculation

403.description: Not a member of this group

post.description: Add a new member to the group (admin only)

403.description: Not an admin of this group

delete.description: Remove a member from the group (admin only)

parameters.description: User ID of the member to remove
parameters.name: userId

403.description: Not an admin of this group

put.description: Update a member's role in the group (admin only)

403.description: Not an admin of this group

get.description: Retrieve paginated chat history for a group

403.description: Not a member of this group

post.description: Send a message to a group (alternative to WebSocket)

403.description: Not a member of this group

get.description: Check if the API and database are healthy
Retrieve the authenticated user's friends list

post.description: Send a friend request to another user

403.description: Not authorized to accept this request
Not authorized to reject this request

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated user's profile information

put.description: Update the authenticated user's display name and avatar

get.description: Search for users by username, email, or phone number
Establish a WebSocket connection for real-time messaging. The connection requires JWT authentication via query parameter or header.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing JWT token

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
